CustomField.description: If Opportunity has a contract and is a revenue opportunity, it will stamp the samsara sales order form else it will be the samsara sales order no contract form
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Type, "Revenue Opportunity"), NOT(ISNULL( ContractId )), NOT(ISBLANK( ContractId )) ), 104, 162 )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If Opportunity has a contract and is a revenue opportunity, it will stamp the samsara sales order form else it will be the samsara sales order no contract form
CustomField.label: NS Custom Form ID
